replies.body:
I understand why Riot would want to make prestige skins, but isn't this starting to be a little too much? If they are made every few patches, then they become less prestigious and just who has more time to play league all year. If this prestige skin is bought only with money, then it falls into the money = prestige that skins kind of already are.


Edit: A little extra thoughts,
The skins seemed prestigious for two reasons. The first is that they are released to celebrate a cool event , the second is that you have to play a lot for them during that event. The K/DA skins made sense, they were part of the biggest event of last year. K/DA Akali was thrown into the snowdown event to catch the tail of the K/DA wave. The bloodmoon skins and firecracker skins are old skinlines, if Riot can make bloodmoon and lunar events seem as cool as K/DA event, then they deserve the prestige status, if they don't, then prestige skins will seem less prestigious and more like the gold character and ability chromas they already are. 

I dunno if this makes sense or if it is a twitch chat BabyRage type of complaint. I just hope that they are tied to game events and that they are spread out a bit more than 4 in four months. Not every event needs a prestige skin, but if it does get one, make it count.
Also, skins always cost money, I don't understand your money argument...

The prestige skins purchase option shouldn't only be money thing. There really was no reason to put this in the comment, it was just an afterthought. 

The skins are monuments to the amount of time that you played to get them. If this skin ended up as a purchase only thing, then the theme of them being bought with time is broken, and the only thing that would separate them from the rest of the skins is cost. 

The only thing that makes them prestige is the fact that time is needed to get the skins without paying $250. If they are only bought with money, the only thing that makes them 'prestige' is that more money is need to buy them.
These are a fun incentive to keep on playing. Nobody is forcing you to play all year long... Just stay updated with patch notes and when you see a skin you like, you can play more.

I think they are implying because there is nothing "prestige" about them, you basically just bought a golden chroma version of the same skin.  Everyone's already figuring that out, and they don't like the idea of paying extra for what amounts to a golden collectors edition.  Personally I don't care for them, but if there are some out there who do then that's fine.  As skins they are probably made to cater to collectors only in the first place.
It's also so obvious that all they care about is money by how difficult it is to get said prestige skins (unless you pay) and the obvious cash grab chromas now. Like come on Riot.

Because $$$. Anything that seems to make Riot money is the way they go now. It wasn't always like that -- they actually cared about how they looked as a company with their tactics, but they are doing crazy stuff now that just makes them look desperate. Shame too since I remember back when they were opposed to any lootbox or special prestige stuff. The only thing they had was Limited Edition (skins never coming back after X time) and Legacy skins (skins that come back every so often). They then brought back almost every single Limited Edition skin and keep coming up with new things to get money over having good content.

Personally, I dislike the prestige skins being able to be bought at all. Make it mission based with some extremely steep goals. I also have some issues with the idea of Chromas on a skin line that has a very particular aesthetic. If you do introduce a few chromas for the blood moon selection, why not do it for all the blood moon skins? The entire point is that it's a blood-red moon. It FEELS like a cash grab, which makes it even worse than a traditional chroma.

Will death recap ever be made...not terrible? I rarely see it mentioned by anyone ever and it certainly never gets any love from a patch. It just seems like something that is better removed at this point if you are not going to fix it. It should display more information in general, and less false information like 8 damage from a minion, or a blank skill picture with the summoners name.

This. All of my this. Death Recap has been a complete joke for far too long. As a Xerath main I find it insulting when an enemy xerath kills me, I pop open death recap, and it says that "Mana Surge" did 400 damage to me. Anyone who plays xerath will just spit their drink at this. Mana Surge gives you mana when you basic attack something. It does no damage at all and never has. Or like that famous clip of sneaky getting oneshot by "Infernal Drake with Statikk Shiv".
The struggles of being a Xerath main
They also should bugfix it a bunch. I often get damage from things with a buggy name that makes no sense. Things like Yasuo doing 500 damage with an ability named "wind effect 2311" or something..

Death recap is one of the most important tools for newer players, imo. New players don't recognize items nearly as easily as damage types, and when that death recap is misleading, or even straight out broken, it leads to some horrible decisions and a lack of understanding that makes the game that much harder to get into. If they take nothing from these comments, this post should be it.

Nasus buff is too much tbh. You can realistically jungle him now and just afk farm till 10 minutes and come out with a 200 stack q. Feels like you tried to keep Nasus relevant with the quicker paced games, but instead of fixing his mobility issues, that have stemmed from the mobility power creep, you simply made him more focused on ignoring the early game and stacking. Interaction with players is key to this game. You are simply giving an incentive for nasus players to ignore their team further, whether that be in a lane or jg.
well he is going to be a perma ban in low elo lol. We might even see him in pro plays
I don't think we'll ever see Nasus in pro play, not in a meta that relies heavily on dashes, jumps, dashes, dashes, stuns, dashes, more cc, did I mention dashes?
Friendly reminder that Khan played Nasus against Soaz's Maokai during 2017 worlds group stage. {{sticker:katarina-love}}
Okay funny joke with the pyke skin. Now where's the ivern skin?
Riot are really money whores for giving chromas to Blood Moon skins. Like if its blood moon and it has a yellow chroma, then is it really a blood moon skin?

"_critiquing IS NOT toxicity_"

Not inherently, but it is when you're cussing them out, caps-locking stuff, and accusing them of playing a mean-spirited joke on you, rather than making a reasoned case for why your suggested change is a good idea that takes into account their previous statements on the general subject.

"{{champion:75}} 's Q - Siphoning Strike: Current stacks"
Now I can tell my team that I've been a good boy.



+12!
If only it actually told your team you were a good dog.
so adc's are still trash, thanks rito

ADC's are "trash" because they exist in a low vision high damage meta where everything popular are the same champions that want to jump on them and kill them, plus all enemy supports are damage dealers.  They also counter tanks which are not strong right now.
The ADC vs Rengar/Vel'koz/Brand fight doesn't end well for the ADC.  You want ADC's to be good again the whole meta needs to change.
I think maybe add the timer to Pyke R if it gets a kill

Honestly, I really like the Ornn passive changes. It makes more sense that he would go make items for people, instead of the shop keeper magically having the upgrades just because Ornn exists in that match.
I miss the shield though. Would've been soo good with the buff on shield bash.

Honestly don't get the point of prestige skins coming out this often. How is it prestige if they are constantly coming out and they are something you have to pay for. They are becoming less and less a more rare thing that is worth getting. I was fine that it costed money to be able to get through tokens and spend the time to get it if it wasnt so common. But seriously how is this prestige anymore and not just like every other chroma at this point?? 

* ~~IT IS A PRESTIGE SKIN THAT IS RARE~~ 
*  It is a chroma like every other except its golden and it costs more money and time invested
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
I like the new ping system. Is it possible to also add Targon stacks to that? Example: I have 5 seconds until I have a stack ready for that cannon.

They just made Kalista entirely useless. her E was amazing for dragon and baron securing and now it isn't, her W was literally only good because of the bonus AD, and her Q is trash no matter what except for the extra hop it adds in there. Riot you goofed on her.

She has a higher AD now though and Q does more damage. 
So her rank 1 W is balanced out by her having the 5 bonus AD at all times, and then past level 2 or 3 she'll have gradually increasing AD. Level 11 Rank 2 Kalista is 1 AD weaker than before, and at 16 is missing 9 AD.

With the Q buff, landing 1 Q makes up for any damage lost from almost four autos (8.1 * 4 = 32.8, Q at rank 5 does 30 more damage.) 
And the most important thing is this means Kalista's support is free to roam without her losing any damage for it. This is strictly stronger than before. 

(Also, her Q passes any spears from a target it kills to the first target it doesn't, so three autos on a minion + Q + E can get an enormous burst down on enemy champions, and you can abuse this to get free spears onto Dragons too.)
Xayah, one of the worst adc's right now. Buff her e by .25 seconds. THAT WILL FIX HER. But Trist gets a huge buff to her e... Also no Kindred skin... :(

Normally I would agree with this statement, but when they reduced Rek'Sai's base health by 50 (or whatever it was), I really felt it in jungle. Small changes like this do seem insignificant, but they can be effective.
In my opinion, extra 0.25 seconds on a snare can be noticeable, but things like "-5 move speed" feel like riot's way of saying "There. We nerfed them. Now stop asking us for things."
It's the same logic as removing 5 move speed from Irelia will balance her.
Xayah has bigger issues. Like {{item:3508}} reverted
ER should never be reverted. Getting 30% CDR from one item was dumb stupid

Well nobody is going to be 100% pleased with everything, but I am excited about the sejuani buff because I love her but felt like she was lacking a lot to play her much. Ornn's going to be really viable again, and the two of them together should make some pretty great combos. LOVE the new sivir skin, I feel like she deserved a good beautiful skin so I'm excited for that. I do want to see a Kindred skin soon though :) Thanks!
No conqueror nerf feels bad
What do you mean that Ornn's W CD is going from ~~14~~ seconds-12 seconds? The current CD is 17/15/13/11/9 seconds.
Can we talk about this new champ? What happens if he steals nidalee ult?
Riot says he gets cougar form.

Hey, you missed a bunch of abilities that have additional information to include in the ping. Like the passive on {{champion:14}} 's W or the stacks on {{champion:31}} 's R. Please, if you're going to make QOL improvements in ping information, make certain that you sweep all passives and abilities for things to be included, even if it doesn't seem to be priority information. Sometimes, being able to humble brag about getting your 11th stack from that dragon or that you're at 1000 bonus health adds reward to common gameplay elements and bolsters team morale.
Ornn is going to do a lot of damage maybe to much actually probably to much.

please give an ability to escape to Diana her E need a stun or push back.
She need a new Q with low cooldown or mana cost to farm in lane (some wave clear without use all your stuff) 
And more mobility ( every ability hit can apply the mark for you ult) :) please test that on PBE
That's not gonna happen lol. Diana is burst. Giving her stun or another escape is broken. She doesnt need a better waveclear.
Yikes
Mastery Tokens need to drop on all maps not just Scuttle crab rift, an S is S.
I think it's cause SR is the more competitive map and getting an S is harder there than say Nexus Blitz or Aram
